job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Work with industry experts in combining the best of deep learning and semiconductor design, to bring on-edge machine learning to listening devices.</p><p><br></p><p>This will improve efficiency and improving privacy, whilst lowering latency and saving bandwidth. Moving away from inference and training that is dependent on cloud or legacy data-centers, this company uses unique technology to accelerate toward processing on device.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>As the first, implementation is on devices with listening capabilities, the company is looking for a strong engineer with the ability to implement speech and audio algorithms in high quality, seamless code.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>If you’re a passionate innovative engineer, excited about the future of deep learning then this is for you.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>To be considered, you'll need;</p><ul><li>Ph.D. in a relevant technical field</li><li>5 years as a strong technical contributor in speech and/or audio processing</li><li>A strong list of patents and publications</li><li>Experience with DSP implementation and optimization of speech and audio algorithms</li><li>Experience with acoustic testing of speech and audio algorithms/devices</li><li>Experience with; machine learning, deep learning, audio processing, speech processing, speech recognition, multi-microphone spatial processing, acoustics echo cancellation, single-channel noise suppression, acoustic testing, source separation, single-channel noise suppression, dereverberation</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><em>Big Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hire.</em></p>
